name: Borhan Uddin
readme_content:
# Hi there 👋, I'm Borhan Uddin!

### Electrical Engineer by Education | Coder by Passion

I'm a **Full-stack Developer** specializing in front-end technologies. I bring ideas to life with **JavaScript, Next.js, TailwindCSS, and Framer Motion**. With a passion for web development, I create responsive and engaging user interfaces, focusing on delivering exceptional user experiences.

## 🌟 What I Do
- **Full-stack Development**: I provide tailored web development solutions on Fiverr, focusing on responsive applications using the MERN stack, Next.js, and TailwindCSS.
- **Freelancing**: With over a year of experience as a freelance developer, I transform client ideas into reality, focusing on high-quality, user-centered applications.

## 🔧 Technologies & Tools
- **Languages**: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python
- **Front-end**: React, Next.js, TailwindCSS, Framer Motion
- **Back-end**: Node.js, MongoDB, Express
- **Others**: Git, GitHub, Figma

I'm always open to discussing new projects, collaborations, or opportunities to learn and grow. Feel free to reach out to me through any of the platforms below!

💡 "Every line of code is a new adventure – let’s build something amazing together!"

borhanrahi/borhan-dev.summary: Recent activities in the borhan-dev repository include multiple updates, fixes, and additions to various aspects of the project, such as the meta, image, bug, space, and responsive design. There have also been updates to the projects and portfolio, along with improvements to the mail and service components. Furthermore, speed optimizations have been implemented, and new pages have been added, including an about page.

borhanrahi/bolt.new-any-llm.summary: The bolt.new-any-llm repository has seen significant activity, with recent contributions focusing on fixing markdown block syntax, redacting file contents, and adding automatic code template detection. Additionally, improvements have been made to the change-log generation script, and the release CI action has been enhanced. Other notable updates include the addition of terminal error capturing, automated fix prompts, and improvements to the Data Tab, providers list style, and experimental features.

borhanrahi/pr-banking.summary: The pr-banking repository has seen updates, including fixes for id issues and the addition of new pages, demonstrating recent activity and maintenance efforts in the project.

profile_summary: I'm Borhan Uddin, a full-stack developer with a passion for web development, specializing in front-end technologies with expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, and a range of frameworks including Next.js and React. With a strong background in electrical engineering and a drive to create exceptional user experiences, I develop responsive and engaging interfaces. I'm excited to collaborate on new projects and explore opportunities to learn and grow as a developer.
